short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display gifs of ASL signs when right-clicking certain English words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a current or aspiring American Sign Language (ASL) user? Do you want quick and easy access to a database of ASL signs? Then this Chrome Extension might be right for you!

Simply turn on the extension, then right-click any word on your screen. If the word is in our ASL database, a gif displaying the ASL sign will pop up in the top left of your screen. To close the gif, simply right-click anywhere else.

I hope you find it helpful!

P.S. if you wish there were more signs, so do I! I'd love any suggestions about good ASL databases I can add to the current collection. Please email me with any tips, thanks!
